description: Shiraishi Urara is a beautiful, intelligent student at the top of her class, and spends much of her free time studying. Frequently the target of bullying by those jealous of her academic success, she grew ever more withdrawn and solitary. One day, she passes Yamada Ryuu on the stairs and he accidentally kisses her after he trips, and they mysteriously swap bodies. They find it convenient to swap bodies from time to time, resolving each others` problems in school.
name: Shiraishi Urara
